Headline: Temporary Eastbound #72 North Ave Reroute near North Avenue Beach
ShortDescription: Eastbound 72 North Ave buses are temporarily rerouted near North Avenue Beach.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
At the request of Police, due to extremely heavy traffic and crowding at the beach, Eastbound #72 North Ave buses will only provide service up to North Avenue and Clark

Westbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #95 95th Temporary Westbound Reroute near 87th/Damen
ShortDescription: Westbound #95 95th buses are temporarily rerouted via Western, 83rd, Damen, then resume normal route, due to street blockage near 87th/Damen.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?

Westbound #95 95th buses are temporarily rerouted via Western, 83rd, Damen, then resume normal route, due to street blockage near 87th/Damen.

Eastbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
